ud7.9:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā mallesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena thūṇaṁ nāma mallānaṁ brāhmaṇagāmo tadavasari.
ud7.9:1.4_0: “samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito mallesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ thūṇaṁ anuppatto”ti.
ud7.9:1.5_0: (…) Udapānaṁ tiṇassa ca bhusassa ca yāva mukhato pūresuṁ:
ud7.9:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma yena rukkhamūlaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
ud7.9:2.2_0: Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
ud7.9:2.3_0: “iṅgha me tvaṁ, ānanda, etamhā udapānā pānīyaṁ āharā”ti.
ud7.9:3.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
ud7.9:3.2_0: “idāni so, bhante, udapāno thūṇeyyakehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi tiṇassa ca bhusassa ca yāva mukhato pūrito:
ud7.9:4.2_0: tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
ud7.9:4.3_0: “iṅgha me tvaṁ, ānanda, etamhā udapānā pānīyaṁ āharā”ti.
ud7.9:4.4_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā pattaṁ gahetvā yena so udapāno tenupasaṅkami.
ud7.9:4.5_0: Atha kho so udapāno āyasmante ānande upasaṅkamante sabbaṁ taṁ tiṇañca bhusañca mukhato ovamitvā acchassa udakassa anāvilassa vippasannassa yāva mukhato pūrito vissandanto maññe aṭṭhāsi.
ud7.9:5.2_0: “acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho, tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
ud7.9:5.3_0: Ayañhi so udapāno mayi upasaṅkamante sabbaṁ taṁ tiṇañca bhusañca mukhato ovamitvā acchassa udakassa anāvilassa vippasannassa yāva mukhato pūrito vissandanto maññe ṭhito”ti.
ud7.9:5.4_0: Pattena pānīyaṁ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
ud7.9:5.5_0: “acchariyaṁ, bhante, abbhutaṁ, bhante, tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
ud7.9:5.6_0: Ayañhi so, bhante, udapāno mayi upasaṅkamante sabbaṁ taṁ tiṇañca bhusañca mukhato ovamitvā acchassa udakassa anāvilassa vippasannassa yāva mukhato pūrito vissandanto maññe aṭṭhāsi.
ud7.9:5.7_0: Pivatu bhagavā pānīyaṁ, pivatu sugato pānīyan”ti.
ud7.9:6.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
